Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.table

Table and table related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BaseTable Defines common methods for Table based components.
CellRenderer Allows cell values to be modified before being displayed.
 

Class Summary
DateTimeCellRenderer A CellRenderer implementation for date and times.
NumberCellRenderer A CellRenderer implementaiton for numbers.
RowSelectionModel Row selection model for tables.
Table<S extends TableSelectionModel> The table is used to display two-dimensional table of cells.
TableColumn A column in a Table.
TableColumnModel<T extends TableColumn> This is the default implementation of a ColumnModel used by the Table.
TableColumnUI  
TableHeader  
TableItem A row in a Table.
TableSelectionModel Abstract selection model for tables.
TableView<T extends TableItem> This class encapsulates the user interface of a Table.
